issues.description: In template, the symbol `fix_vec_sub_asm` is exported (global) so it can be called from `main`, but in the solution file it is declared as `extern`, preventing the symbol from being exported. This mismatch in symbol visibility would lead to linker errors or confusion about how to correctly expose the function.
issues.suggested_fix: In the solution file, replace the line `extern fix_vec_sub_asm` with `global fix_vec_sub_asm` so that the function is properly exported for linking.
